title: Impressions
description: Tracks when impressions are presented on a site, along with names, types, and counts.

xdm:impressionDisplays.title: Impression Displays
xdm:impressionDisplays.description: Counts the number of times an impression item has been displayed to a visitor.

xdm:impressionID.title: Impression ID
xdm:impressionID.description: Tracks the ID of an item in an impression array.

xdm:impressionType.title: Impression Type
xdm:impressionType.description: Tracks the type of impression in an impression array.
